page.title: 14A TYPICAL SATURDAY IN BATH
page.content: A typical day in my life is {Saturday} because I go down to town with my sister to look in the shops and sometimes to buy something. There is an interesting and very big toy shop called {Hamleys.}Then we go up to my Nan's where we have dinner and sometimes we go in the park. Back at home I just play and watch television. On some Saturdays I participate in Saturday Sport at the Bath Sports and Leisure Centre where you can take part in Gymnastics, Squash and Badminton. I often play with my best friends but usually I play with my sister in the back garden. Because I have got some gymnastics rings in the back garden I am able to practise regularly.
